content: 3 more times k1 sl2wyf row 17 k3 * ssk 3 times yo k1 5 times yo k2tog 3 times repeat from * 3 more times k1 row 10 k across to last 2 sts sl2wyf sl2wyf row 19 21 and 23 k3 *p3 k3 p5 k3 p3 repeat from * 3 more times k1 sl2wyf row 25 k3 * ssk 3 times yo k1 5 times yo k2tog 3 times repeat from * 3 more times k1 sl2wyf row 27 k across to last 2 sts sl2wyf page4 metanoia wrap knitting pattern metanoia lace chart key finishing continuing with colora bind off loosely using a simple bind off technique for example k1 *k1 pass 1st st over the 2ndst keeping the single stitch loose repeat from * across until 1 st remains break yarn and pull through last st weave in ends wet-block let dry and wrap yourself with a knitted hug knowing that you are on a journey into a new way of living metanoia final border chart page5
